message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer! I'm interested in the product but $110 is a bit too high for my budget. Would you consider $90?
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer! I understand your budget constraints, but I'm still a bit above your offer. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $100.
